title: QuickBite
description: Designed a mobile food ordering platform enabling users to explore restaurants, filter by price, place orders, and view routes on a map.

title: Chat For Change
description: An AI-powered chatbot developed to provide mental health support through real-time, interactive conversations. Using Python, Flask, and TensorFlow, the chatbot is designed to assist users by analyzing their queries and sentiment effectively.

title: preserveIT
description: A mobile app for real-time cultural heritage reporting. Built with React Native, Node.js, MongoDB, and Socket.io, it allows users to submit alerts on heritage sites, enabling swift administrative response.

title: Urban Transit Management System
description: A platform for managing bus schedules, driver assignments, and demand forecasting with an intuitive front-end for efficient transit operations.
